title: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonics
b. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for the super class), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeName
f. The label could say 'Select destination type:'
g. Browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes)
c. Title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'
Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.
e. Destination type can be source type: Refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo-changes in all referencing classes.
OB:
When going to the next page, the dialog shows 'Type not found' instead of showing the expected destination type.
The browse button is smaller than the standard button size.
EB:
The title should be updated to 'Move static field(s)' and the description should be updated to 'Move x fields from xx'.
The selection dialog should be initialized with the currently entered type.
SR:
1. Open the Move static member dialog.
2. Enter a destination type.
3. Click on the Next button.
4. Verify that the dialog shows the entered destination type instead of showing 'Type not found'.
5. Verify that the size of the browse button matches the standard button size.
6. Verify that the selection dialog is initialized with the currently entered type.
